title: NYC Transportations patterns
description: This project presents a detailed analysis of New York Cityâ€™s transportation ecosystem, exploring how mobility behaved across time, space, and competitors. The dashboard highlights whether transportation supply meets growing demand and uncovers patterns in trip trends, geographic hotspots, and operational efficiency.

title: Predict Health Metrics
description: This project focuses on analyzing health metrics to perform two predictive tasks: predicting blood pressure using regression models and predicting diabetes outcomes using classification models. The workflow encompasses data cleaning, visualization, feature analysis, and the training of both linear and logistic models to generate accurate and actionable health predictions.

title: Markov Chain Stock Movement Prediction
description: A Markov Model is a probabilistic model that describes a system moving between different states over time, where the next state depends only on the current state, not on the full history
